name: 0.51.5 Release.
body:
## What's Changed
* Only enable APS ACKs for packets without implicit delivery notification by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1085
* 0.51.5 Release by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1086


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/compare/0.51.4...0.51.5

name: 0.51.4 Release
body:
## What's Changed
* Correct documentation: Salus is not hue by @davet2001 in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1075
* Allow ZDO deserialization to fail without logging a warning by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1079
* Add `access` and `mandatory` fields to ZCL attribute definitions by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1074
* Only update `last_seen` on RX by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1082
* 0.51.4 Release by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1084


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/compare/0.51.3...0.51.4

name: 0.51.3 Release.
body:
## What's Changed
* Add a recursive `Struct.to_dict` and a `Struct.from_dict` method by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1069
* Internally pass schema `args` and `kwargs` without expansion to avoid collisions by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1070
* 0.51.3 Release by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1072


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/compare/0.51.2...0.51.3

name: 0.51.2 Release.
body:
## What's Changed
* Handle devices sending non-ZDO packets to endpoint 0 by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1065
* 0.51.2 Release by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1066


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/compare/0.51.1...0.51.2

name: 0.51.1 Release.
body:
## What's Changed
* Handle request keyword arguments in quirks by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1056
* Expose `min_value` and `max_value` on integer types by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1058
* Update README.md to mention OTA for SONOFF/ITEAD by @Hedda in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1062
* 0.51.1 Release by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1063


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/compare/0.51.0...0.51.1

name: 0.51.0 Release.
body:
## What's Changed
* Add additional endpoint configuration option by @prairiesnpr in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1048
* Implement the full OTA `image_block_response` structure by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1047
* Pin Python versions in CI by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1050
* [RFC] Use a single structure and mirrored functions for transmitting/receiving Zigbee packets by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1043
* 1.SONOFF Zigbee device OTA support by @lisongjun12 in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1040
* Update README.md Zigbee OTA summery by @Hedda in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/994
* 0.51.0 Release by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1054

## New Contributors
* @lisongjun12 made their first contribution in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1040

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/compare/0.50.3...0.51.0

name: 0.50.3 Release.
body:
## What's Changed
* Add a `create_new` kwarg to `BackupManager.restore_backup` by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1044
* Compare network state to last backup on startup by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1037
* 0.50.3 Release by @puddly in https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/1045


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/compare/0.50.2...0.50.3

name: 0.49.0 Release.
body:
## Changes

- 0.49.0 Release @puddly (#1026)
- Log the full traceback when one occurs during startup @puddly (#1025)
- Replace `is_reply` with `direction` in ZCL headers @puddly (#1022)
- Automatically restore the most recent network backup instead of forming a new network @puddly (#1023)
- Set the request header's `direction` bit according to the cluster type @puddly (#1021)
- Allow disabling network backups @puddly (#1020)

name: 0.10.0 Release.
body:
## Breaking ##
- Refactor EUI64. (#240)

## Fixes ##
- Override ZLL profile id for replies. (#235)
- Don't use Command enum for cluster specific commands. (#236)
- Update README.md formatting (#238)

## Changes ##
- Readme Zigate support update (#233)
- ZCL Foundation Data types. (#232)
- Remove bad hack (#239)
- Allow Zigbee network parameters update. (#243)
- Use zigpy.types.EUI64 for ieee. (#246)

name: 0.9.0 Release.
body:
## Breaking ##
Track request/reply sequence in Zigpe (per device) instead of relying on the radio libs. This makes any radio libs older than:
- https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy-deconz/releases < 0.4.0
- https://github.com/zigpy/bellows/releases < 0.10.0
- https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy-xbee/releases < 0.5.0
- https://github.com/doudz/zigpy-zigate/releases < 0.4.0
incompatible with this version of zigpy.

## Changes ##
- Adopt Black code formatting tool
- Track requests/replies in zigpy (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/223)
- Reply with the same TSN from original request (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/224) Fixes #209 
- Refactor destination address for cluster binding (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/229)

name: 0.8.0 Release.
body:
## New ##
- Zigbee OTA updating -- think twice before enabling this. See https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/213 for details.

## Changes ##
- ZCL frame header deserialization/serialization refactoring (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/212)
- A bit more efficient attribute cache restoring (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/214)
- Mark clusters as server/client (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/216)
- ZCL Global commands refactoring (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/218, https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/219)
- Adopt black code formatter (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/220)

name: 0.7.2 Release.
body:
## 0.7.2 Release
- Differentiate input/output (server/client) clusters (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/216)

name: 0.7.1 Release.
body:
## Fixes
- Don't apply quirks second time to a quirked device (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/199)

name: 0.7.0 Release.
body:
## Fixes
- Handle undefined Statuses deserialization (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/191)

name: 0.6.1 Release
body:
## Fixes
- Don't override endpoint's manufacturer/model from quirks (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/187)

name: 0.6.0 Release
body:
## Changes
- Refactor endpoint initialization. Request `manufacturer` & `model` from a single endpoint and use that info for other endpoints (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/181)
- Refactor requesting `node_descriptor` during Zigpy device initialization: Don't issue a new request, if there's one already in progress triggered by incoming data (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/182)
- Refactor quirks matching (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/183)

## New
- Allow many (`manufacturer`, `model` tuples) to one quirk matching https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/183

name: 0.5.0 Release
body:
## New
- Add new ZLO device types #176 

## Fixes:
- Fix ZDO schema for `Mgmt_LQI_rsp` and `Mgmt_Rtg_rsp` commands #175

## Changes
- Access Groups cluster via `ep_attribute` when adding endpoint to a group #171 

## Fixes
- DoorLock cluster schema entries
- Thermostat cluster schema entries

## New ##
Zigpy device group management (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/156)

## Fixes ##
`Time` Cluster response (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/152)
`zigpy.zcl.foundation.ConfigureReportingResponseRecord` deserializtion/serialization methods (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/161)
`zigpy.zcl.foundation.WriteAttributeResponseRecord` deserializtion/serialization methods (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/161)

## Changes ##
ZDO commands as Enum (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/143)
ZCL Character string class (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/147)
Allow Optional parameters for cluster commands/responses (https://github.com/zigpy/zigpy/pull/160)

## Changes
* Fetch ZDO "node descriptor" when device joins the network
* Update `LightLink` (touch link) cluster schema
* Pretty print received attribute updates
* `__repr__()` for `zcl.foundation.TypeValue` class
